summary: This document is a collection of inmate roster and out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated between July and August 2019. It shows the daily assignment and location of inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein, during his incarceration prior to his death.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on multiple dates in July and August 2019, with various housing unit assignments (e.g., U01-001L, M01-001L, Z04-206LAD).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, in July and August 2019.
The documents show Epstein's specific housing unit assignments changed over time (e.g., U01-001L, M01-001L, Z04-206LAD).
Epstein was incarcerated alongside other inmates, including Tartaglione, Araujo, Moore, Myrie, Mack, and Elansky.
The records are routine prison administrative forms (Out-Count forms and Inmate Rosters) documenting inmate locations and counts.
These records cover the period leading up to Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
